snippet: Nine-time French Open champion Rafael Nadal pulled out of the Grand Slam tournament on Friday, citing an injury to his left wrist....
lead_paragraph: Nine-time French Open champion Rafael Nadal pulled out of the Grand Slam tournament on Friday, citing an injury to his left wrist.

headline.print_headline: 9-Time Champion Nadal Out of French Open With Injured Wrist
headline.main: 9-Time Champion Nadal Out of French Open With Injured Wrist
